name: Four Knight's of the Apocalypse, Horsemen of Famine
text: This monster can only be summoned if you control a monster with

in its name. Whenever a monster is normal summoned your opponent discards a card from there hand. When ever a monster is special summoned your opponent sends a card from the top of there deck to the graveyard. When your opponent activates a spell or trap they must send the top 5 cards of there deck to the graveyard.
